mapper.delete: DELETE FROM enrollment WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM enrollment WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND course_id = #{courseId})

SELECT e.id AS enrollmentId, c.id AS courseId, c.name AS courseName, c.publisher_grade, c.publisher_class, c.publisher_name, c.description, e.enroll_time FROM enrollment e JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.id WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY e.enroll_time DESC
